## priority tasks

```{r}
tasks <- read_rds("data/tasks.rds")

tasks %>% 
  filter(p == "star") %>% 
  arrange(c) %>%
  group_by(c) %>% 
  mutate(n = 1:n()) %>%
  dplyr::filter(n <= 4 ) %>% 
  select(-c, -p, -n) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = vars("priority", "category")
  )

```
